TextView.android:text: Sekhmet is the warrior goddess and the goddess of healing. She is known to help protect Egyptian pharaohs during warfare. She is also a solar deity which is why she bears the solar disk on her head. She is often depicted as a women with the head of a lioness with a solar disk and uraeus on her head. Uraeus is a headdress of a cobra which symbolized sovereignty, royalty, deity, and divine authority.
